name: Arthur Adventure - A Stickman Story
description:
Arthur is a Stickman lost in a strange world, far away from his home. You have to find your way through the traps and dangers in order to come back to your country.

Your only power, beside moving and jumping, is reversing time at any moment, even -for a few second - after your death. You have a limited time, and use this power consume it faster. Every traps can only be activated once.

Run : Arrow keys

Jump : Space

Rewind Time : "R"

A very little amount of blood can be present in this game.
